title: Options do not belong to File menu
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
In latest NB mRemoteNG v1.78.2 NB 3224:
1. File | Options
2. Tabs & Panels and turn on "Always show panel tabs".
3. File | New Connection file and create new file.
4. Create new connection and double click.
5. With new connection also new panel is displayed.
6. File | Open Connection File and open previous file.
7. Double click on connection and new connection opens with panel displayed.

This is little bit confusing. Are File | Options dependent of connection file or not? It looks like Options ...
